p: Antinutrients can be harmful to human health and may pose negative effect by reducing protein digestibility and mineral bioavailability. Low levels of phytate, oxalate, and alkaloids were observed with moderately high level of saponin. However, the presence of moderate level of saponin should not pose a problem if properly processed since processing decreases the level of antinutrients to permissible levels (Jimoh et al., 2010; Ndidi et al., 2014).
